description: This file defines interfaces and template classes related to stream handling within the WPEFramework project. Specifically, it declares the IStream interface with functions for stream state management and identification, and a StreamType template class that combines a base stream class with the IStream interface.

classes.name: IStream
classes.description: Interface defining common stream operations such as open, close, and status checks, along with identifier retrieval.

classes.name: StreamType
classes.description: Template class that inherits from a base stream class and implements the IStream interface, providing concrete implementations for stream management.

methods.name: IStream::~IStream
methods.description: Virtual destructor for the IStream interface.

methods.name: IStream::IsOpen
methods.description: Checks if the stream is open.

methods.name: IStream::IsClosed
methods.description: Checks if the stream is closed.

methods.name: IStream::LocalId
methods.description: Returns the local identifier of the stream.

methods.name: IStream::RemoteId
methods.description: Returns the remote identifier of the stream.

methods.name: IStream::Open
methods.description: Opens the stream, possibly waiting for a specified duration.

methods.name: IStream::Close
methods.description: Closes the stream, possibly waiting for a specified duration.

methods.name: IStream::Trigger
methods.description: Triggers or signals the stream.

methods.name: StreamType::StreamType
methods.description: Constructor template that initializes the base stream with provided arguments.

methods.name: StreamType::~StreamType
methods.description: Destructor for the StreamType class.

methods.name: StreamType::IsOpen
methods.description: Checks if the underlying base stream is open.

methods.name: StreamType::IsClosed
methods.description: Checks if the underlying base stream is closed.

methods.name: StreamType::LocalId
methods.description: Retrieves the local identifier via the base stream.

methods.name: StreamType::RemoteId
methods.description: Retrieves the remote identifier via the base stream.

methods.name: StreamType::Open
methods.description: Opens the stream via the base stream.

methods.name: StreamType::Close
methods.description: Closes the stream via the base stream.

methods.name: StreamType::Trigger
methods.description: Triggers the base stream.

methods.name: uint32_t Close(const uint32_t waitTime)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool IsClosed() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool IsOpen() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: string LocalId() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: uint32_t Open(const uint32_t waitTime)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: string RemoteId() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: StreamType(Args...args)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: void Trigger()
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: StreamType
ctags.pattern: /^    class StreamType : public BASESTREAM, public IStream {$/
